@DanjelvdWal @Netlify Yes! Occasionally companies need the repo (no problem) and even the build bots (our sales team can talk about) to be on-prem or in a particular geo. But more often there is confusion about hosting on a server, vs hosting static assets on a CDN as close to users as possible.
